General.Name: Lingyuan Iron & Steel Co Ltd
General.Description: Lingyuan Iron & Steel Co., Ltd. engages in the production, operation, and development of metallurgical products; and mining, washing, and deep processing of ferrous metal ores in China. The company offers hot-rolled round steel, rebars, medium and wide bands, wire rods, welded steel pipes, etc. It also exports its products to approximately 30 countries and regions, including Southeast Asia, the Middle East, the United States, and Africa. Lingyuan Iron & Steel Co., Ltd. was founded in 1994 and is based in Lingyuan, China.
